abstracts.cdata!:
The project will include institutional
            development as well as rehabilitation and high priority
            expansion of existing water systems. Specifically, the
            project will consist of: (i) institutional strengthening
            through technical assistance, staff recruitment, staff
            redeployment and training; (ii) emergency replacement of
            mechanical, electrical and water treatment plant and
            equipment; (iii) rehabilitation and completion of water
            supply systems; (iv) expansion of water supply systems to
            meet urgent needs; (v) improvement of Ghana Water and
            Sewerage Corporation's (GWSC) workshops, stores and
            training centers, and provision of staff housing; (vi)
            supply of essential equipment and materials; and (vii)
            technical studies.
